channel.title: Satire on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Saturday Brief: D-Day for Opposition Leader Vote Tomorrow
item.description: Parliament meets Monday to elect Opposition Leader as rights groups sound alarm, plus chikungunya alert, Women's Chamber tackles care work, and more from Guyana's newspapers

item.title: Patriots Portfolio: This Week's Investment Opportunities for True Guyanese
item.description: Your weekly satirical investment advice from the most patriotic portfolio manager in Guyana.
